May 23, 2004

Romney

Kevin Drum points us to a LA Times article on Massachusetts Governor Mitt Romney, which he boils down to its essence: > Gay marriage opponents are now invoking laws originally designed to make it more difficult for blacks and whites to marry each other. I hope they’re proud of being the modern day heirs of Jim Crow.
